website_summaries.verdict: A set of nine elegant polished granite whiskey stones to keep your whiskey cool without watering your drink down.
pros: This affordable set of granite whiskey stones features a solid core
They're durable and BPA-free so popping them into your drink is safe and won't create a nasty aftertaste
Each stone is uniformly sized and although they're solid, they're not too heavy
cons: Smaller than other whiskey stone options

customer_reviews.title: Material density doesn't equate to cold drinks.
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! These really suck! I am really surprised. Granite has a density of 2.75 g/cm3. Aerospace Nickel has a density if 2.96 g/cm3!! These have been in my freezer for a week and won't chill a shot of whiskey! Man did I get this wrong!! ABORT!
customer_reviews.author: AH 2

customer_reviews.title: They don’t cool drink!
customer_reviews.text: The cold stones don’t cool drinks. They have to be added with ice cubes to keep the drink cooler longer. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: William Londell

customer_reviews.title: What a waste.
customer_reviews.text: What a friggin’ waste. One of the few times I didn’t read reviews, but they’re accurate: these don’t chill a damn thing. If I hadn’t trashed the box, I’d return. Completely wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: M. P. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: For experienced drinkers
customer_reviews.text: Heavy granite and easy to clean. These are for whiskey drinkers that don’t like their drink watered down and prefer the drink to be cool, NOT COLD. 4 Rocks: Takes 10 minutes to notice a difference in temperature of 4 oz pour
customer_reviews.author: Caesar

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my brother and he absolutely loves them! They look very modern and work very well and don't change the taste of drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Amazon Prime delivers, as promise  !!!  Thanks so much !
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so they are enabling a procrastinator, but they saved a holiday gift set that was incomplete by delivering the vital missing components on Christmas eve !!! I needn't have worried about quality either, as the item is everything that I hoped for. Thanks again and happy holidays.
customer_reviews.author: TruBluRose

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Don’t expect these to chill your drink. They work best when your spirit it’s pre chilled. Nice presentation in velvet bag. * be smart. Don’t drop them in your glass. Place them in gently. Pretty pleased for our bourbon tasting.
customer_reviews.author: LoLo

customer_reviews.title: Fun -- but heavy, so be careful
customer_reviews.text: Like those plastic, liquid-filled colored "ice cubes," these are fun to use and won't water your drink. They don't work quite as well as real ice, so you might need one extra, but they work. They're solid and heavy, so if you like to drop things into your glass from high up . . . .
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Just not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good idea at the time but after using them several times, they just do not add much chill to my drinks. Maybe I am adding to much Bourbon to my glass.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Practical
customer_reviews.text: Interesting shape bit they only slightly cooled down my glass of room temperature whiskey. Not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kindly

customer_reviews.title: Complete Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I didn't listen to the reviews, these things just don't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: There’s enough of them there for more than two drinks. I like that
customer_reviews.text: There’s enough of them there for more than two drinks. I like that
customer_reviews.author: Harold Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Limited effeciency
customer_reviews.text: Takes a lot of cubes to affect a change in temperature
customer_reviews.author: Yves Veronneau

customer_reviews.title: Does not cool well
customer_reviews.text: I did not feel that it cools the drink well.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjeewa K. Jayasinghe

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again...
customer_reviews.text: These do not stay cold for more than a couple seconds. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shanelle Bowser

customer_reviews.title: Don't remain frozen for long
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive these. I enjoy cold coffee in the morning as well as coconut water throughout the day and don't want either of those to be diluted with ice cubes. They appear very durable, easy to wash but they just don't stay frozen for very long. I was a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Use these with--NOT instead of--ice.
customer_reviews.text: These will keep a cold drink cold, but not cool a warm drink down. They are really nice though. They have a nice finish, and they are pretty heavy. I like them, but they're not very effective on their own; use them with ice for a drink that stays cold longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cool, doesn't make it cool
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect these to chill you whiskey, they don't. They will help keep it chilled if it already is, but not for long. Overall they are nothing more than a novelty really.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Christianson

customer_reviews.title: They are not Ice
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the advertisement said these stones stay colder longer than ICE. They simply do not. One item they got right is these stones do not water down the drink. Don't expect too much from these stones to cool your drink and you wont be disappointed like I was.
customer_reviews.author: Tepster

customer_reviews.title: You had one job...
customer_reviews.text: They don’t really chill the whiskey. I think because they are relatively small and the facets make for a lot of surface area, they warm up to quickly and don’t keep the whiskey cold. They do look nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but not that cold.
customer_reviews.text: They're handsome, but they don't seem to stay cold that long after putting them in a drink.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My hubby got these for me to enjoy some recent bourbons we got on vacation. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kat G

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: These things do not cool down your drink. I keep them really cold in the freezer. I can put all of them in a glass of whiskey and it does not cool down my drink at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Cool, Tastes Good... Not So Much
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to give these as a gift to someone, but unfortunately they give your drink a metallic taste. I guess they can end up being a cute coffee table piece, but I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Only eight stones instead of nine.
customer_reviews.text: I just gave two boxes of these as gifts. One contained nine whiskey stones, as advertised, the other contained only eight. I can't return a gift I gave someone else, but it was an awkward situation. These boxes were not sealed in any way. Perhaps that is the problem.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: They're stones. You freeze them.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty basic product. It's a set of stones resembling 12 sided dice. You freeze them and pour whatever your drink is over them. Root beer, probably. Anyhow, they keep your drink cold without watering it down. So, basic. And these work well enough. They're a good product at a good price. Not bad at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kit Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I hate waterd down scotch. I like the shape(something different then a cube) chilled the drink down to a good temp. They don't stay cold forever and neither will ice. They are a good size I could only fit 4 flat in the rocks glass and they didn't hit my lip till I took the last sip and tipped the glass way back.
customer_reviews.author: Mike m.

customer_reviews.title: Nice whiskey stones
customer_reviews.text: I have the whiskey stones. (So hard to sort through these things when all the reviews get thrown together.) They come in a little black velvet back so that you can leave them in the freezer. I didn't realize at first that they're actual stones, which is great. Keep them in the freezer till you need them, and they will help keep your beverage cold for a stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Mainiac

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful whiskey stones
customer_reviews.text: How nice, I actually never used stones to chill my whiskey before, it works really well! I left the stones in the freezer overnight (instructions say atleast 4 hours) wow, they were cold! It definitely chilled my beverage. The stones actually match our counter too which is a nice plus. Great product, these would go great as a present for any drinker!
customer_reviews.author: Big Dawgs Fam

customer_reviews.title: Chill drinks nicely and leave no taste
customer_reviews.text: These do a nice job in place of ice cubes. They hold their cold temp for many minutes and leave no taste at all. I tried them in iced vodka and they lent no flavor to the vodka at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Flegal

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.  The size is probably the best attribute
customer_reviews.text: I own quite a few whiskey stones, metal cubes, etc... These are neither the best nor the worst of the lot. The size is rather versatile, especially of you use a glencairn glass, and the smooth marble offers a contrast the usual granite. I prefer the granite, and don't expect miracles--you're adding something that doesn't really retain a lot of heat (or coolness) nor adds much in the way of nuanced flavor (smooth marble).
customer_reviews.author: Shane O. Laake

customer_reviews.title: These are a really nice quality set of whiskey stones
customer_reviews.text: These are a really nice quality set of whiskey stones. Perfect for gift giving. They are solid stone and don't impart any taste to your beverage. They look more expensive than they are.
customer_reviews.author: banana wind

customer_reviews.title: Very Elegant
customer_reviews.text: These really are elegant looking. Great for keeping drinks from being diluted.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

product_meta.title: Outset Granite Whiskey Stones, Small Black, 3/4"
product_meta.description: The solution to diluted drinks is here. Chill whiskey and spirits without watering them down with this set of nine polished black granite whiskey stones. They stay cold longer than ice and will add a touch of elegance to your beverage. Simply place the stones in the freezer, and in a few hours, they'll be ready for use. Included is a convenient black velvet storage bag for easy transporting or storing when not in use. Now you can enjoy a whiskey on the rocks, literally.
feature_bullets: Elegant, polished black granite construction, set of 9
Chill whiskey and spirits without dilution from melting ice, enjoy chilled beverages that aren't watered down
Stays cold longer than ice! Simply store in your freezer, the stones will be ready to use in a few hours
Includes a convenient black velvet storage bag for easy transporting or storing when not in use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars157 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
